content: i worked out these 28 stitch socks with a waffle stitch pattern in several different yarns and yarn combinations for my charity knitting the sizes range from 6 to 8 inch foot i m hoping that posting the free pattern here will inspire more charity knitting i am knitting now for the we care - maine 1 ravelry group please help us keep children warm 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/we-care---maine
